test_string_empty.description: A test to check the lengh of VAR is zero (i.e. it is empty) and returns TRUE if so.

test_string_equal.description: A test to compare two different STRINGS and returns TRUE if they are of equal value.

test_string_not_empty.description: A test that checks the length of a STRING is greater than zero and returns TRUE if so.

test_string_not_equal.description: A test to compare two different STRINGS.  Returns TRUE if they are NOT of equal value.

test_int_equal.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if they are of equal value.

test_int_great_equal.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if INTEGER1 is of equal or greater value than INTEGER2.

test_int_great_than.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if INTEGER1 is greater than INTEGER2 in value.

test_int_less_equal.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if INTEGER1 is less than or equal to INTEGER2 in value.

test_int_less_than.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if INTEGER1 is less than INTEGER2 in value.

test_int_not_equal.description: A test to compare two different INTEGERS.  Returns TRUE if INTEGER1 is NOT equal to INTEGER2 in value.

test_exist.description: A test to check if FILE exists.

test_exist_file.description: A test to check if FILE exists and is a regular file.

test_exist_directory.description: A test to check if a FILE exists and is a directory.

test_exist_readable.description: A test to check if FILE exists and read permission is granted.

test_exist_writeable.description: A test to check if FILE exists and write permission is granted.

test_exist_executable.description: A test to check if FILE exists and execute (or search) permission is granted.

test_exist_link.description: A test to check if FILE exists and is a symbolic link (same as -L).

test_file_equal.description: A test to check if FILE1 and FILE2 have the same device and inode numbers.

test_file_new_than.description: A test to check if FILE1 is newer (modification date) than FILE2.

test_file_old_than.description: A test to check if FILE1 is older than FILE2.
